channel.title: Posts on Bit By Bit
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Bit By Bit

item.title: We are your package maintainers, and we are here to help
item.description: So, I was on my computer, doing normal computer stuff. Suddenly, a new window reared its head. Whew! It was the Ubuntu Software Updater, here to bring vetted, cryptographically signed updates to my computer, security patches among them. Yay! I had nothing to fear. Or so it would seem. Being curious, I started poking around. Not long after, I was confronted with this: Sorry, security people, I should have tagged this post Not Safe Or Secure.
